item.title: pbcopy and pbpaste for terminal
item.author: Shoaib Bakhtyar
item.description: 1 2 3 4 # This will copy all the content within a file. $ cat myfile.txt | pbcopy # This will output the contents of your clipboard. $ pbpaste Copy and pasting for Linux Unfortunately the pbcopy and pbpaste commands are exclusively for Mac, but you can recreate these commands on Linux by using xsel. Add these lines inside your .bashrc file and start a new terminal. 1 2 3 ## Linux version of OSX pbcopy and pbpaste.
